name: .TMAP
summary: Learn about .TMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a TMAP file with TissUUmaps (multiplatform). To do so, select File â†’ Open from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and select your TMAP file. Note that for your project to appear correctly in TissUUmaps, you must also possess the images the project uses, and they must be stored in the location(s) specified in your TMAP file.
You can also open a TMAP file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform), GitHub Atom (multiplatform), or any other text editor, to view the plain text data it contains.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .tmap file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: TMAP file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
